ygData.subject: Re: Web Update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Augh...  stop with the cyan text already, I think my eyes are getting worse by the second...  ;)  Put it on a black background, and it d look okay...
ygData.messageBody:
At 16:09 5/4/99 PDT, you wrote:
> Yeah, hum, sorry again. I was a bit fast and didn't
>check for the address. Though it was sent to me and other users, not the
>mailing list. Didn't see that. I had received such an email before and
>thought it was another. Once more I apologize. That wasn't even about
>interest, just because I already have a lot to read with the onelist
>emails. :)
>

Augh... stop with the cyan text already, I think my eyes are getting worse
by the second... ;) Put it on a black background, and it'd look okay...
